title: Sunrise
description: This is book 4 in the Asphalt Gods' MC Series with Scar and Seven Sunsets preceding it and Hell on Heelz as a stand alone spin off.   18+   When his president’s health takes a turn for the worst, Scar takes over to rule the Gods but the Sons of Satan MC are looking for revenge and their new president is looking for Halley, who for all Scar knows is dead. When he finally gets a call from Cowboy, telling him his sister is in fact alive and the General traded his woman to the mob, all hell breaks loose in Tucson. Can Scar keep his sister from the clutches of the SOS with backstabbers all around him? Can he keep his friend Cowboy out of his sister’s pants? Will he ever find Emery again?
author: Morgan Jane Mitchell
